tweet.text: “This is THE SUPER BOWL,” Secretary Shultz wrote to President Reagan of the U.S.-Soviet Geneva Summit of 1985. 🏈 Read Shultz’s enthusiasm for these historic talks on the nuclear arms race in #FRUS: https://t.co/G2SRCOLCFc 📷 @Reagan_Library (NARA ID: 75854473) https://t.co/9SyY3b7Xo4
